[
    If {
        condition: Variable(
            SimpleVariable(
                SimpleVariable {
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        5,
                    ),
                    name: "foo",
                },
            ),
        ),
        then: [],
        else_ifs: [],
        else: Some(
            [
                If {
                    condition: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    5,
                                    12,
                                ),
                                name: "bar",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    then: [],
                    else_ifs: [],
                    else: None,
                },
            ],
        ),
    },
]
